sentence.english: He isn't feeling bad about his decision anymore.
sentence.spanish: Él ya no se siente mal por su decisión.

sentence.english: She is painting a beautiful landscape this afternoon.
sentence.spanish: Ella está pintando un paisaje hermoso esta tarde.

sentence.english: Were they living in a big house when they were children?
sentence.spanish: ¿Vivían en una casa grande cuando eran niños?

sentence.english: I'm not drinking cold water because I have a sore throat.
sentence.spanish: No bebo agua fría porque tengo dolor de garganta.

sentence.english: Does he prefer dark chocolate to milk chocolate?
sentence.spanish: ¿Prefiere él el chocolate oscuro al chocolate con leche?

sentence.english: They weren't buying cheap products for their business.
sentence.spanish: Ellos no compraban productos baratos para su negocio.

sentence.english: Are you keeping your room clean these days?
sentence.spanish: ¿Mantienes tu habitación limpia estos días?

sentence.english: She isn't walking through dangerous areas at night.
sentence.spanish: Ella no camina por áreas peligrosas por la noche.

sentence.english: He found the exam very difficult last week.
sentence.spanish: Él encontró el examen muy difícil la semana pasada.

sentence.english: Are they trying different restaurants every weekend?
sentence.spanish: ¿Prueban restaurantes diferentes cada fin de semana?

sentence.english: I'm not wearing dirty clothes to the interview.
sentence.spanish: No llevo ropa sucia a la entrevista.

sentence.english: Was the stadium empty during the final match?
sentence.spanish: ¿Estaba el estadio vacío durante el partido final?

sentence.english: She finds mathematics easy compared to other subjects.
sentence.spanish: Ella encuentra las matemáticas fáciles comparado con otras asignaturas.

sentence.english: Do they always buy expensive brands?
sentence.spanish: ¿Siempre compran marcas caras?

sentence.english: He wasn't driving fast on the motorway.
sentence.spanish: Él no conducía rápido en la autopista.

sentence.english: Are the shopping centres full during sales season?
sentence.spanish: ¿Están los centros comerciales llenos durante la temporada de rebajas?

sentence.english: She is cooking a good meal for her family tonight.
sentence.spanish: Ella está cocinando una buena comida para su familia esta noche.

sentence.english: Does he have high expectations for this project?
sentence.spanish: ¿Tiene él altas expectativas para este proyecto?

sentence.english: They weren't drinking hot coffee in summer.
sentence.spanish: Ellos no bebían café caliente en verano.

sentence.english: I'm not using my left hand for writing.
sentence.spanish: No uso mi mano izquierda para escribir.

sentence.english: Was she carrying a light bag for her trip?
sentence.spanish: ¿Llevaba ella una bolsa ligera para su viaje?

sentence.english: Are you growing your hair long like last year?
sentence.spanish: ¿Te dejas crecer el pelo largo como el año pasado?

sentence.english: He doesn't have low self-confidence anymore.
sentence.spanish: Él ya no tiene baja autoestima.

sentence.english: They are buying a new car next month.
sentence.spanish: Ellos compran un coche nuevo el próximo mes.

sentence.english: Do you collect old coins as a hobby?
sentence.spanish: ¿Coleccionas monedas viejas como hobby?

sentence.english: She wasn't from a poor family background.
sentence.spanish: Ella no era de un entorno familiar pobre.

sentence.english: Are they becoming rich from their investments?
sentence.spanish: ¿Se están haciendo ricos con sus inversiones?

sentence.english: He is giving the right answers in class.
sentence.spanish: Él está dando las respuestas correctas en clase.

sentence.english: Does she feel safe walking home alone?
sentence.spanish: ¿Se siente ella segura caminando a casa sola?

sentence.english: They weren't wearing the same clothes as last time.
sentence.spanish: Ellos no llevaban la misma ropa que la última vez.

sentence.english: I'm not writing a short story for the competition.
sentence.spanish: No escribo un cuento corto para el concurso.

sentence.english: Was he living in a small apartment in the city?
sentence.spanish: ¿Vivía él en un apartamento pequeño en la ciudad?

sentence.english: Are the trains running slow today due to the weather?
sentence.spanish: ¿Circulan los trenes lentos hoy debido al clima?

sentence.english: She is building strong muscles at the gym.
sentence.spanish: Ella está construyendo músculos fuertes en el gimnasio.

sentence.english: Does he play basketball because he is tall?
sentence.spanish: ¿Juega al baloncesto porque es alto?

sentence.english: They weren't painting ugly pictures for the exhibition.
sentence.spanish: Ellos no pintaban cuadros feos para la exposición.

sentence.english: He doesn't feel weak after his recovery.
sentence.spanish: Él no se siente débil después de su recuperación.

sentence.english: Are they giving the wrong information to customers?
sentence.spanish: ¿Dan información incorrecta a los clientes?

sentence.english: She looks young for her age.
sentence.spanish: Ella parece joven para su edad.
